page.title: 05TREVARRIAN HOLIDAY PARK
page.content: This is a day in the life of Mr Phillips of{TREVARRIAN HOLIDAY PARK. In The Summer.6.30-8.00 Get ready to start the day ie clean toilets, clean recreation room, open swimming pool and open shop, take dogs for exercise. 8.30-9.00 breakfast. 9.00-12.30 siting new campers, see to traveller's bookings, enquiries. 12.30-1.30 dinner. 1.30-5.00 Exercise dogs,check swimming pool,add chemicals if needed,check toilets and recreation room, clean and tidy.General grass cutting around the site,putting in new arrivals.5.00-5.30 Tea. Feed dogs,take them for exercise. 5.30-8.00 Get recreation room ready for the night's entertainment.8.00-11.00 Work behind the bar(soft drinks) during the evening. Empty meters and phone box. Close pool.Close shop at 10. 11-12 Lock up and check everything.
